Description: Pass leading to the Tombs of the Kings, Thebes; two men, one standing, the other seated in left foreground near the entrance to the pass, steep bare cliffs to right, one pierced by square opening. 1839 Watercolour
Bibliographic references: Binyon 1898-1907 / Catalogue of drawings by British artists, and artists of foreign origin working in Great Britain (32)
Associated places: Topographic representation of: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: William James Müller (sale Christie's 1.iv.1846/ lot 29)
